targetAudience: beginners and intermediate learners, students, career switchers, and early professionals
mainGoal: to offer free and affordable learning resources including interactive tutorials, beginner-friendly courses, coding challenges, and a supportive community for Q&A and peer learning.
colorScheme: blue and white with accents of teal or light green

branding.logo: modern, minimalistic logo that reflects learning, growth, and technology
tagline: Empowering Learners, One Line at a Time.
Your Path to Mastery Starts Here.
branding.colorPalette: vibrant yet professional with blue, green, and white

structure.title: Introduction to Web Development
topics: Overview of Frontend, Backend, and Full Stack Development
Tools and Technologies for Web Development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks)

structure.title: HTML Basics
topics: Essential HTML Tags (Headings, Paragraphs, Links, Images)

structure.title: CSS Basics
topics: Responsive Design: Making Your Website Mobile-Friendly

structure.title: JavaScript Basics
topics: DOM Manipulation: Changing HTML and CSS with JavaScript

structure.title: Building a Simple Website
topics: Step-by-Step Guide to Building a Static Website
Creating a Contact Form and Validation

structure.title: Introduction to Web Development Tools
topics: Version Control with Git and GitHub

structure.title: Introduction to Web Hosting
topics: How to Host Your Website on Platforms like GitHub Pages or Netlify

structure.title: Final Project
topics: Apply HTML, CSS, and JavaScript Knowledge

structure.title: Conclusion and Next Steps
topics: Overview of Next Steps for Learning Web Development
Resources for Advancing to Backend or Full Stack Development

additionalFeatures: Quizzes after each module to assess understanding.
Practical Projects that learners can showcase in their portfolio.
Discussion Forums for community interaction and doubt resolution.
Certificate of Completion upon finishing the course.
